channel.title: I think I made a fix for the 2 major reasons servers crash!
channel.description: You know when your server crashes and you look at your runserver.bat and it says (playername) is already online. But is says that for everybody but it never stops. I think I found a fix for that so it automatically resets your server when it happens. I also think that I found a way to make it do the same thing if it says (playername) can't log in because there is too many players online. I've yet to actualy test it but I'm pretty sure it works. After I test it do you guys thing I should make a tutorial on how to add it to your server it if it works?

item.title: I think I made a fix for the 2 major reasons servers crash!
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

Yeah, you should make a tutorial on it. I’ve only seen a couple decent ones lately, but not as if I could do better myself.

Read full topic
item.source: I think I made a fix for the 2 major reasons servers crash!

item.title: I think I made a fix for the 2 major reasons servers crash!
item.dc:creator: @Nintendo_G Nintendo_G
item.description:
@Nintendo_G wrote:

[quote=“VorargC, post:2, topic:97111”]Uh yeah definitely!
Ive been wanting to fix that… just too lazy :P[/quote]
I’ve spent all day on it. I need a bunch of people to sign on my server to test it. Almost always when there’s a bunch of people it does whoevers already online but it never does the too many players online anymore because I edited the max players to 200

Read full topic
